brief_title: Evaluation of Fanconi Syndrome and Cystinosis
brief_summary: OBJECTIVES: I. Classify renal tubular defects using clinical and biochemical findings in patients with Fanconi syndrome and cystinosis.
detailed_description: PROTOCOL OUTLINE: Patients receive a clinical and biochemical evaluation, including a psychometric assessment and molecular, renal, and thyroid studies.
criteria: - Inherited renal tubular defects, i.e., Fanconi syndrome - Fanconi syndrome due to cystinosis eligible
